name: Emily's Stories: Coloring Book
description:
Tired? Welcome to the colorful adventure world of Emily’s Stories.
Enjoy bright antistress pictures collected in breathtaking color story.

Relax. Meditate while coloring pages and listening to relaxing music. Color the gray areas so that you get a beautiful full picture.

Story. Dive deep into Emily's interactive adventures and find out how her mysterious story ended. Color pictures to open new episodes of the coloring book!

Puzzles. Solve interactive puzzles to unlock secrets and move through the episodes.

Knowledge. Get a curious fact from each colored picture during the game and share it with your friends.

Best of Emily’s Stories:

More than 100 unique pictures for coloring, created by our talented artists.
Dozens of hours of fascinating narratives.
Full immersion in adventure due to exciting interactivity.
Timely tips that won't let you get nervous.
New episodes will appear soon.

Emily’s Stories is not an ordinary coloring book by numbers for adults, it is a full-fledged journey into Emily’s adventures through colored pages with interactive elements and puzzles.

- You can subscribe to Vip membership to play without implicit ads, unlock all pictures in the gallery and receive bonus resources every day.

- You are able to choose a subscription option: a weekly subscription (free for the first 3 days) for $4.99 USD

- Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew to a paid subscription. You can cancel your subscription or free trial in the iTunes settings at least 24-hours before the end of the free trial period. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to the free service.

- Please note that any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.
